mcpServers.title: MCP Servers
mcpServers.subtitle: Plugin Management
mcpServers.description: Configure and manage your MCP servers. Connect to external tools and services through command-line or URL-based interfaces.

actions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this MCP server?
actions.unshareConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to unshare this server? Other users will no longer be able to access it.

form.addDescription: Create a new MCP server configuration. Choose between STDIO (command-based) or SSE (URL-based) server type.
form.name: Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: (Optional) Brief description of the server's purpose
form.envVarsHelp: Enter environment variables in KEY=value format, one per line
form.headersHelp: Enter headers, one per line in the format: Header-Name: Header-Value
form.sessionIdHelp: Provide a session ID for stateful connections (optional)
form.serverUrlHelp: Must be a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL
form.notesPlaceholder: Add any notes, usage instructions, or known quirks for this server...

empty.title: No Servers Found
empty.noServers: You haven't added any MCP servers yet

import.title: Import MCP Servers
import.description: Import multiple MCP server configurations from JSON. This will add new servers without replacing existing ones.

error.importFailed: Failed to import servers. Please check the console for details.

export.title: Export MCP Servers Configuration
export.description: Your MCP server configurations in JSON format, ready to import on another instance.

shareCollection.title: Share Server Collection
shareCollection.description: Share your selected MCP servers with other users.

warning.unsharedServersDescription: Some of the selected servers are not currently shared. They will be shared automatically when you share this collection.

form.title: Collection Title
form.titlePlaceholder: Enter a title for your server collection
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what these servers are used for and how they work together

errors.mustBeSharedForCollection: Server must be shared to be included in a collection.

notes.title: Notes
notes.placeholder: Add notes about this server's configuration, usage instructions, or any other relevant information...

resources.title: Discovered Resources
resources.name: Name
resources.noResources: No static resources have been discovered for this server yet. Try running discovery.

templates.title: Resource Templates
templates.name: Name
templates.noTemplates: No resource templates have been discovered for this server yet. Try running discovery.

prompts.title: Discovered Prompts
prompts.name: Name
prompts.noPrompts: No prompts have been discovered for this server yet. Try running discovery.

tools.title: Discovered Tools
tools.noTools: No tools discovered for this server yet. Try using the "Discover Tools" button on the server card.

instructions.title: Custom Instructions
instructions.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe the purpose of these instructions
instructions.descriptionHelp: This description is for your reference only.
instructions.messagesHelp: Enter an array of MCP Message objects in JSON format.
instructions.infoText: These instructions can potentially be used by MCP clients (like Cline) to provide context to the AI when using this server's tools. The exact usage depends on the client implementation.
